title: Bluetooth Device Pairing Issues
description: Fix Bluetooth headphones, mouse, keyboard connection problems.

steps.title: Enable Bluetooth
steps.instruction: Ensure Bluetooth is turned ON in your system settings. Windows: Settings → Bluetooth & Devices. Mac: System Preferences → Bluetooth.

steps.title: Put Device in Pairing Mode
steps.instruction: On your Bluetooth device, press and hold the pairing button (usually 3-5 seconds) until the LED blinks rapidly.

steps.title: Remove Old Pairing
steps.instruction: In Bluetooth settings, find the device in the list, click 'Remove' or 'Forget', then try pairing again fresh.

steps.title: Restart Bluetooth Service
steps.instruction: Turn Bluetooth OFF, wait 10 seconds, turn it back ON. Or restart your computer.

steps.title: Check Device Battery
steps.instruction: Ensure your Bluetooth device is charged. Low battery can cause connection issues.
